name: operational-ui
description: Building blocks for effective operational user interfaces
author: Tejas Kumar <tejas@contiamo.com>

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -f packages/*/package-lock.json && rm -f packages/*/yarn.lock && rm -f yarn.lock
scripts.precommit: lerna run lint && lerna run prettier && git add .
scripts.verify: lerna run package && lerna run test && lerna run lint && lerna run prettier
